description: Leading the incremental migration from Angular to React, modernizing the frontend through component refactors and safe, small-step rollouts. Introduced Storybook to enable component-driven development and faster, more reliable UI work. Maintain legacy Angular and PHP code while gradually migrating features, and implement CI/CD and testing practices to improve quality. Mentor junior developers with hands-on guidance and code reviews, and champion AI-assisted pair-programming by creating practical guidelines to improve accuracy and productivity. Deliver work iteratively using Scrum/XP/Kanban processes.

Spearheaded frontend development for an AI-powered conversational commerce platform, building sophisticated user interfaces with Vue.js and React. Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js (Express) and Ruby on Rails, ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend systems. Implemented comprehensive testing strategies and established CI/CD workflows, significantly improving code reliability and deployment efficiency.

Built and maintained full-stack web applications for multiple clients, delivering modern solutions using React (Next.js), Vue.js (Nuxt.js), and robust backend APIs with Node.js and Ruby on Rails. Architected responsive, mobile-first interfaces and managed MySQL databases while implementing containerized development and production environments using Docker. Successfully developed cross-platform mobile applications with Flutter and established automated CI/CD pipelines.

Led the migration of a legacy Koa-based system to a modern Express architecture, improving maintainability and performance. Developed comprehensive GraphQL APIs and built dynamic frontend applications using Vue.js (Nuxt.js) and React. Managed cloud infrastructure across Google Cloud, Digital Ocean, and AWS, implementing containerized solutions with Docker and establishing automated deployment pipelines.
